original_title: The Day the World Series Stopped
overview: An eyewitness account from a baseball fan with a video camera of the 7.0 earthquake that struck Candlestick Park at Game Three of the 1989 World Series. A riveting tale of sport, tragedy, and triumph of the human spirit.
tagline: An eyewitness account of the 1989 World Series earthquake
title: The Day the World Series Stopped
